for_sales.sales_text:
A Heard 28, built in 1989, "Molly Oxford" was professionally fitted out by Robertson"s of Woodbridge. The interior design and build quality are excellent and she’s in good condition inside and out, a credit to her builders and owners. 

A review by Classic Boat Magazine described her as "the nicest Heard 28 I"ve seen" [copy  available]. Equipped for offshore cruising with modern navigation aids: Raymarine C90 Plotter; VHF DSC/AIS;  Raymarine Bi Data Log/Depth. An Insurance Survey in 2019 found no major defects. Rigging replaced 2016, engine rebuilt 2009. 

In recent years she"s taken part in the Brest and Douarnenez Festivals, Falmouth Classics and Yarmouth Old Gaffers. The present owner has downsized to a smaller Gaffer.

"Molly Oxford" is afloat and in commission at Chichester West Sussex, an opportunity for a new discerning skipper to continue her adventures.

boat.name: Molly Oxford
boat.short_description: Molly Oxford is a gaff cutter fitted out in 1989 by Robertsons of Woodbridge, based on a Heard 28 GRP hull built in Falmouth.
